vernac_cmds: Inductive dyadic_rational : Type := | m_over_2_to_n: forall m n:nat, dyadic_rational.

Inductive dr_eq : dyadic_rational -> dyadic_rational -> Prop := | dr_eq_refl: forall x:dyadic_rational, dr_eq x x | dr_eq_sym: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_eq x y -> dr_eq y x | dr_eq_trans: forall x y z:dyadic_rational, dr_eq x y -> dr_eq y z -> dr_eq x z | dr_eq_scale: forall (m n:nat), dr_eq (m_over_2_to_n m n) (m_over_2_to_n (2*m) (S n)).

Inductive dr_lt : dyadic_rational -> dyadic_rational -> Prop := | intro_dr_lt: forall m m' n:nat, m < m' -> dr_lt (m_over_2_to_n m n) (m_over_2_to_n m' n) | dr_lt_wd: forall x x' y y':dyadic_rational, dr_lt x y -> dr_eq x x' -> dr_eq y y' -> dr_lt x' y'.
Lemma dr_incr_denom: forall (m n n':nat), n<=n' -> exists m':nat, dr_eq (m_over_2_to_n m' n') (m_over_2_to_n m n).
apply dr_eq_trans with (m_over_2_to_n m' m0); trivial.
Lemma dr_total_order: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_lt x y \/ dr_eq x y \/ dr_lt y x.
destruct (dr_incr_denom m n n') as [m0]; trivial.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m0 n') (m_over_2_to_n m' n'); trivial.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m' n') (m_over_2_to_n m0 n'); trivial.
assert (n' <= n) by auto with arith.
destruct (dr_incr_denom m' n' n) as [m0]; trivial.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m n) (m_over_2_to_n m0 n).
apply dr_eq_trans with (m_over_2_to_n m0 n); trivial.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m0 n) (m_over_2_to_n m n); trivial.
Local Notation " ' x " := (Zpos x) (at level 20, no associativity) : Z_scope.
Fixpoint pos_power2 (n:nat) : positive := match n with | O => 1%positive | S m => ((pos_power2 m)~0)%positive end.
Definition dr2Q (x:dyadic_rational) : Q := match x with | m_over_2_to_n m n => (Z_of_nat m) # (pos_power2 n) end.
Lemma dr2Q_wd: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_eq x y -> dr2Q x == dr2Q y.
replace ((' (pos_power2 n)~0)%Z) with ((2 * ' pos_power2 n)%Z) by trivial.
Lemma dr2Q_incr: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_lt x y -> dr2Q x < dr2Q y.
Lemma Qlt_dr_lt: forall x y:dyadic_rational, (dr2Q x < dr2Q y)%Q -> dr_lt x y.
Lemma dyadic_rationals_dense_in_reals: forall x y:R, 0 <= x < y -> exists q:dyadic_rational, x < Q2R (dr2Q q) < y.
assert (forall m:Z, exists n:nat, ((m < ' pos_power2 n)%Z)).
unfold Zlt in H0; simpl in H0.
replace (0 * _) with 0 in H2 by ring.
apply Rlt_trans with (Q2R (Zneg p # pos_power2 n)).
Variable normal_sep_fun: forall F U:Ensemble (point_set X), closed F -> open U -> Included F U -> { V:Ensemble (point_set X) | open V /\ Included F V /\ Included (closure V) U }.
Definition Un (n:nat) : Ensemble (point_set X) := match n with | O => U0 | S O => U1 | S (S _) => Full_set end.
Lemma Un_open: forall n:nat, open (Un n).
Lemma Un_incr: forall n:nat, Included (closure (Un n)) (Un (S n)).

Definition expand_U_dyadic (f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X)) (Hopen: forall n:nat, open (f n)) (Hincr: forall n:nat, Included (closure (f n)) (f (S n))) (n:nat) : Ensemble (point_set X) := if (even_odd_dec n) then f (div2 n) else let m := div2 n in proj1_sig (normal_sep_fun (closure (f m)) (f (S m)) (closure_closed _) (Hopen _) (Hincr _)).
Lemma expand_U_dyadic_open: forall f Hopen Hincr n, open (expand_U_dyadic f Hopen Hincr n).
Lemma expand_U_dyadic_incr: forall f Hopen Hincr n, Included (closure (expand_U_dyadic f Hopen Hincr n)) (expand_U_dyadic f Hopen Hincr (S n)).

Definition packaged_expand_U_dyadic : { f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X) | (forall m:nat, open (f m)) /\ (forall m:nat, Included (closure (f m)) (f (S m))) } -> { f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X) | (forall m:nat, open (f m)) /\ (forall m:nat, Included (closure (f m)) (f (S m))) }.
refine (fun fsig => match fsig with | exist f (conj Hopen Hincr as a) => exist _ (expand_U_dyadic f Hopen Hincr) _ end).
Definition U_dyadic_level_n (n:nat) : { f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X) | (forall m:nat, open (f m)) /\ (forall m:nat, Included (closure (f m)) (f (S m))) }.

refine (let lev_n := fix lev_n (n:nat) : { f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X) | (forall m:nat, open (f m)) /\ (forall m:nat, Included (closure (f m)) (f (S m))) } := match n with | O => exist _ Un _ | S n' => packaged_expand_U_dyadic (lev_n n') end in lev_n n).
Definition U_dyadic (x:dyadic_rational) : Ensemble (point_set X) := match x with | m_over_2_to_n m n => (proj1_sig (U_dyadic_level_n n)) m end.
Lemma U_dyadic_wd: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_eq x y -> U_dyadic x = U_dyadic y.
replace ((2 * S m0)%nat) with ((S (S (2 * m0)))%nat) by ring.
Lemma U_dyadic_open: forall x:dyadic_rational, open (U_dyadic x).
Lemma U_dyadic_incr: forall x y:dyadic_rational, dr_lt x y -> Included (closure (U_dyadic x)) (U_dyadic y).
Definition Urysohns_Lemma_function : point_set X -> point_set RTop.
refine (fun x:point_set X => proj1_sig (inf (Add (Im [ alpha:dyadic_rational | In (U_dyadic alpha) x ] (fun alpha:dyadic_rational => Q2R (dr2Q alpha))) 1) _ _)).
cut (Q2R 0 <= Q2R (Z_of_nat m # pos_power2 n)); auto with real.
Lemma Urysohns_Lemma_function_range: forall x:point_set X, 0 <= Urysohns_Lemma_function x <= 1.
cut (Q2R 0 <= Q2R (dr2Q x0)); auto with real.
Lemma Urysohns_Lemma_function_0: forall x:point_set X, In U0 x -> Urysohns_Lemma_function x = 0.
Lemma Urysohns_Lemma_function_1: forall x:point_set X, ~ In U1 x -> Urysohns_Lemma_function x = 1.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m n) (m_over_2_to_n (nat_of_P (pos_power2 n)) n).
match goal with |- ?a >= ?b => cut (b <= a); auto with real end.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Full_set) end.
cut (Urysohns_Lemma_function x0 < x); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = IndexedUnion (fun alpha:{alpha:dyadic_rational | Q2R (dr2Q alpha) < x} => U_dyadic (proj1_sig alpha))) end.
destruct inf in Heqy; simpl in Heqy.
exists (exist (fun beta:dyadic_rational => Q2R (dr2Q beta) < x) alpha H5).
cut (Urysohns_Lemma_function x0 < x); auto with real.
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) >= x1); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Full_set) end.
cut (x < Urysohns_Lemma_function x0); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Empty_set) end.
apply Rle_trans with 1; auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = IndexedUnion (fun alpha:{alpha:dyadic_rational | x < Q2R (dr2Q alpha) < 1} => (Complement (closure (U_dyadic (proj1_sig alpha)))))) end.
unfold Urysohns_Lemma_function in Heqy; destruct inf in Heqy; simpl in Heqy.
exists (exist (fun alpha0:dyadic_rational => x < Q2R (dr2Q alpha0) < 1) beta H10).
cut (x < Urysohns_Lemma_function x0); auto with real.
unfold Urysohns_Lemma_function; destruct inf as [y]; simpl.
assert (dr_lt alpha beta \/ dr_eq alpha beta).
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) <= Q2R (dr2Q beta)); auto with *.
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) <= Q2R (dr2Q beta)); auto with *.

Theorem UrysohnsLemma: forall X:TopologicalSpace, normal_sep X -> forall F G:Ensemble (point_set X), closed F -> closed G -> Intersection F G = Empty_set -> exists f:point_set X -> point_set RTop, continuous f /\ (forall x:point_set X, 0 <= f x <= 1) /\ (forall x:point_set X, In F x -> f x = 0) /\ (forall x:point_set X, In G x -> f x = 1).
destruct (H3 F G H0 H1 H2) as [U [V [? [? [? [? ?]]]]]].
assert (inhabited (forall F U:Ensemble (point_set X), closed F -> open U -> Included F U -> { V:Ensemble (point_set X) | open V /\ Included F V /\ Included (closure V) U })).

destruct (choice (fun (FU_pair: {p:Ensemble (point_set X) * Ensemble (point_set X) | closed (fst p) /\ open (snd p) /\ Included (fst p) (snd p)}) (V0:Ensemble (point_set X)) => open V0 /\ Included (fst (proj1_sig FU_pair)) V0 /\ Included (closure V0) (snd (proj1_sig FU_pair)))) as [pre_choice_fun].
exists (Urysohns_Lemma_function _ normal_sep_fun U (Complement G) H4 H1 H9).

command: apply dr_eq_trans with (m_over_2_to_n m' m0); trivial.
replace ((' (pos_power2 n)~0)%Z) with ((2 * ' pos_power2 n)%Z) by trivial.
refine (fun fsig => match fsig with | exist f (conj Hopen Hincr as a) => exist _ (expand_U_dyadic f Hopen Hincr) _ end).

refine (let lev_n := fix lev_n (n:nat) : { f:nat->Ensemble (point_set X) | (forall m:nat, open (f m)) /\ (forall m:nat, Included (closure (f m)) (f (S m))) } := match n with | O => exist _ Un _ | S n' => packaged_expand_U_dyadic (lev_n n') end in lev_n n).
refine (fun x:point_set X => proj1_sig (inf (Add (Im [ alpha:dyadic_rational | In (U_dyadic alpha) x ] (fun alpha:dyadic_rational => Q2R (dr2Q alpha))) 1) _ _)).
cut (Q2R 0 <= Q2R (Z_of_nat m # pos_power2 n)); auto with real.
cut (Q2R 0 <= Q2R (dr2Q x0)); auto with real.
apply dr_lt_wd with (m_over_2_to_n m n) (m_over_2_to_n (nat_of_P (pos_power2 n)) n).
match goal with |- ?a >= ?b => cut (b <= a); auto with real end.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Full_set) end.
cut (Urysohns_Lemma_function x0 < x); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = IndexedUnion (fun alpha:{alpha:dyadic_rational | Q2R (dr2Q alpha) < x} => U_dyadic (proj1_sig alpha))) end.
destruct inf in Heqy; simpl in Heqy.
exists (exist (fun beta:dyadic_rational => Q2R (dr2Q beta) < x) alpha H5).
cut (Urysohns_Lemma_function x0 < x); auto with real.
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) >= x1); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Full_set) end.
cut (x < Urysohns_Lemma_function x0); auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = Empty_set) end.
apply Rle_trans with 1; auto with real.
match goal with |- open ?U => assert (U = IndexedUnion (fun alpha:{alpha:dyadic_rational | x < Q2R (dr2Q alpha) < 1} => (Complement (closure (U_dyadic (proj1_sig alpha)))))) end.
unfold Urysohns_Lemma_function in Heqy; destruct inf in Heqy; simpl in Heqy.
exists (exist (fun alpha0:dyadic_rational => x < Q2R (dr2Q alpha0) < 1) beta H10).
cut (x < Urysohns_Lemma_function x0); auto with real.
unfold Urysohns_Lemma_function; destruct inf as [y]; simpl.
assert (dr_lt alpha beta \/ dr_eq alpha beta).
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) <= Q2R (dr2Q beta)); auto with *.
cut (Q2R (dr2Q alpha) <= Q2R (dr2Q beta)); auto with *.
